snippet: At least six people were killed Monday by gunmen who robbed jewelry stores in the eastern Baghdad neighborhood of Shaab, security officials said.
abstract: At least six people are killed by gunmen who robbed jewelry stores in Baghdad, Iraq; militant groups frequently rob stores to finance their operations.
lead_paragraph: At least six people were killed Monday by gunmen who robbed jewelry stores in the eastern Baghdad neighborhood of Shaab, security officials said.

headline.main: Iraq: Gunmen Kill at Least 11 in Separate Attacks
headline.print_headline: Iraq: Gunmen Kill at Least 11 in Separate Attacks
